reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute with an adorable little bear design and appreciate its nice quality and perfect fit. Customers disagree on the sweater's bulkiness, with some describing it as very bulky.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Cozy, and Cute Sweater with a Great Fit
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I purchased the Round Neckline Graphic Bear Long Sleeve Sweater in size L, and I ended up getting it in three colors: red, beige, and green. I’m really happy with all of them. The softness of the fabric is one of the first things I noticed, it feels comfortable against the skin and not scratchy at all. The sweater has a nice thickness that keeps you warm, but it’s not overly bulky, so it layers well without feeling heavy. In terms of comfort, it’s easy to wear all day and still feels relaxed and cozy. The colors are true to the photos and look great in person, with each shade being rich and well-made. The size L fits as expected, offering a comfortable, slightly relaxed fit without looking oversized. Overall, this sweater checks all the boxes for comfort, style, and quality, and it’s a great value for the price. Read more
items.author: Save and Fancy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice Quality and super cute
items.body: Super cute absolutely beautiful great quality. It does run small. I did buy an extra large and I am 53 130 pounds. But it was a little big. I should’ve taken a large period Read more
items.author: Alina

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: It's cute and of nice quality but cropped. It’s not heavy because it’s not real wool, but you get what you pay for. For reference, I’m 5’3 and 120 lbs. Read more
items.author: Millennial lady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than photos
items.body: Super soft, cute and well made. Fits true to size. Not truly cropped...just shorter than a regular length...perfect for me. Read more
items.author: L. Moore

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute and Cozy Sweater
items.body: Super cute and soft sweater. Keeps me really warm and is so fun and easy to style. I find it perfect for fall for a simple look or to dress up! Great quality too, absolutely recommend! The detail is also really nice. I received so many compliments and you will to Read more
items.author: Rose

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome find
items.body: Great quality and so cute. True to size and long enough to wear maternity if needed Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bearyyy Cute (hehe)
items.body: This definitely has an oversized fit for someone who is short and petite. I’m usually a medium and thought that this would run smaller, but I want to try to a size small to get that cropped fit. UPDATE: The small is exactly what I wanted. Read more
items.author: chyeaaa

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: Run small and crop. Read more
items.author: Jessica L

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1-dark Navy, 4-brown, 4-pink, 0-navy Blue, 2-coffee, 0-olive Green, 0-khaki, 0-wine, 4-grey, 0-grey, 2-beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
